text:
Anne Elizabeth Belden (born April 18, 1987 in Newport Beach, California) is an American water polo player. She was a member of the United States women's national water polo team. She played at the 2010 FINA Women's Water Polo World Cup.
She played for University of California, Los Angeles's women's water polo team.

annotations.surface_form: United States women's national water polo team
2010 FINA Women's Water Polo World Cup
